articles.description: Many Americans welcomed the guilty verdicts in Derek Chauvin's murder trial but said much work remains to prevent police misconduct.
articles.content:
MINNEAPOLIS When Susan Scalf and Amy Powers arrived outside the Hennepin County Government Center on Tuesday to hear the verdicts in Derek Chauvin's murder trial, their stomachs were in knots.

articles.title: Derek Chauvin guilty of all charges for George Floyd's murder - The Star Online
articles.description: MINNEAPOLIS (AFP): Derek Chauvin, a white former Minneapolis police officer, was convicted Tuesday of murdering African-American George Floyd after a racially charged trial that was seen as a pivotal test of police accountability in the United States.

articles.title: WATCH | Former Minneapolis cop Derek Chauvin convicted of George Floyd's murder - News24
articles.description: Sacked police officer Derek Chauvin was convicted of murder and manslaughter Tuesday in the death of African-American George Floyd in a case that roiled the United States for almost a year, laying bare deep racial divisions.
articles.content:
• A jury has found former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin guilty of the murder of George Floyd back in 2020.
